EmailTemplate.subject: Friendly Reminder - See You at the Honeywell Operators Conference in Asia Pacific!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
GoDirect Users Conference
Dear valued customers,
We are pleased to invite you to the next Honeywell | GoDirect Users Conference in Philadelphia!
Date: May, 10 2017
Location: The Doubletree Hilton
4509 Philadelphia Avenue Philadelphia, Pennsylvania
This half-day conference will provide customers with a comprehensive overview and understanding of the latest flight and cabin connectivity services available from Honeywell GoDirect. Presentations will outline next-generation connectivity services, such as Inmarsat’s JetConneX Ka service and value-added tools Honeywell GoDirect provides to control costs and improve user experience. Live demonstrations of the newest GoDirect apps and tools will also be performed. Topics include: | Ka-Band | SwiftBroadband | Flight Support Services | Routers | Apps | Technical Support |
Please RSVP by April 25, 2017
CLICK HERE TO REGISTER <[[mailto:Jason.Wissink@Honeywell.com]]>
Detailed agenda to follow.
